lyrics.stanza: What miracle! What mystery! That God and man should blended be! God became man to make man God, Untraceable economy! From His good pleasure, heart's desire, His highest goal attained will be.

Flesh He became, the first God-man, His pleasure that I God may be: In life and nature I'm God's kind, Though Godhead's His exclusively. His attributes my virtues are; His glorious image shines through me.
No longer I alone that live, But God together lives with me. Built with the saints in the Triune God, His universal house we'll be, And His organic Body we For His expression corp'rately.
(Repeat the last two lines of each stanza.)
